issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_0::goa: Show a location or the community that your issue is about.
issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_4::goa: Photograph another important but different example that illustrate the issue and its impact.
issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_6::goa: Show the effect of the issue. Show how it impacts the community.
issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_1::goa: Show people affected by the issue.
issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_5::goa: Photograph another important but different example that illustrate the issue and its impact.
issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_7::goa: Has anything been done about the issue? Show the change.
If nothing has changed, show that.
issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_2::goa: Shoot a photo that sums up the the issue and its impact.
issue_highlights_photo::text_card_0::tex: If there are more than three, you should add clips to include them.
issue_highlights_photo::clip_card_3::goa: Photograph the most important example that illustrates the issue and its impact.
